name: Crowbar
description:
Dive with the players to the bottom in search of loot. How deep can you swim? How about returning with your booty back to shore to register your depth record and save all the gold you find? Collecting gold and dying with it at the bottom is not about this game.

Controls:

  • Interaction with interactive objects:
  • Approach the object, point the mouse, press [E]
  • To exit the ship's sodule / throw an item [Q]
  • Steering with the WASD ship
  • WS pump control
  • Gun control WS + LMB

You need 4 to 6 people to play
